ej,murtd101,M,dascf901,Beanball war $Vern Law threw at Ruben Gomez; HP umpire Frank Dascoli warned Law; Pirates Manager Danny Murtaugh ran onto the field to protect Law but started arguing with Gomez; Gomez swung his bat at Murtaugh but missed; Murtaugh threw a punch at Gomez but also missed; both benches cleared and there was a 15 minute delay; Murtaugh ejected by Dascoli1958PIT.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
